creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Currently and related to Bug 58884 if user has not set correct "jmeter.save.saveservice" properties some Graphs/Tables will be empty or generation may fail as per Bug 58884.


This bugzilla is created to:
- Update documentation to clearly mention what properties are required for each Graph/Report
- Improve logging to explain why a report will be empty

Date: Mon Feb  8 11:50:41 2016
New Revision: 1729145

URL: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=1729145&view=rev
Log:
Bug 58932 - Report / Dashboard: Document clearly and log what report are not generated when saveservice options are not correct
#resolve #112
Bugzilla Id: 58932
